errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred in this component.

welcome.title: Welcome to CC Copilot
welcome.subtitle: Your intelligent coding assistant is ready
welcome.step1: 1. Create Project: Click "New Project" button, select project folder
welcome.step2: 2. Start Conversation: Click "+" button next to project or click on history session
welcome.step3: 3. Switch Channel: One-click switch between different accounts/API channels in status bar
welcome.faq1Answer: Download and install from official Anthropic website
welcome.faq2Answer: Click status bar at bottom right to switch between providers
welcome.faq3Answer: Set up proxy in Settings for network access

statusBar.notActivated: Not activated - need to use a history session to activate

settings.title: Settings
settings.detectTimeout: Detection timeout, please ensure Claude CLI is working properly and retry
settings.commandFailed: Claude command execution failed, please check if Claude CLI is correctly installed
settings.noAccountSelected: Please ensure the correct Claude account is selected
settings.networkError: Network or system error occurred during detection, please check application status and retry
